about_the_game:
Lathe Machine DLC for Milling Machine Simulator

Expand your milling experience with our brand-new Lathe Machine DLC!

About This Content:

Dive deeper into the world of precision engineering with the Lathe Machine DLC for Milling Machine Simulator. Whether you're an experienced machinist or just getting started, this DLC offers a comprehensive suite of tools and functionalities to bring your creative visions to life.

Features:

🔧 Enhanced Mechanics: Experience the precision and efficiency of the lathe machine, designed to simulate real-world turning and shaping of metals.

🎓 Tutorials: Dive into our in-depth tutorials, specifically crafted for those venturing into the world of the lathe machine. Learn the ropes and ensure you're well-prepared to tackle future projects.

⏳ Challenging Projects (Coming Soon!): Ready for a challenge? Our new projects tailored for the lathe machine are in development and will offer an intricate career path filled with unique challenges. Stay tuned and be among the first to test your skills and master them all!

🔍 Detailed Visuals: Our state-of-the-art graphics bring the lathe machine to life, offering a visually rich experience that's as close to the real thing as it gets.

🌐 Community Integration: Share your lathe-made creations with our ever-growing community. Get feedback, tips, and perhaps find a few fans along the way!

💡 Innovative Ideas: With the combination of milling and lathe mechanics, the creative possibilities are endless. What masterpieces will you craft?

Technical Details:

Requires Milling Machine Simulator (base game) on Steam in order to play.
Seamless integration with the base game ensures a smooth transition between milling and lathe functionalities.
Elevate your machining prowess in Milling Machine Simulator with the Lathe Machine DLC. Grab it today and stay excited for the upcoming challenging projects!

name: Lathe Machine Simulator
short_description: Step up your game in Milling Machine Sim with the all-new Lathe Machine DLC! Delve into intricate mechanics, reshape your virtual workshop's horizon, and unleash unparalleled craftsmanship. An evolution in machining awaits. Are you ready to lead the revolution and champion the art of the lathe?
supported_languages:
English*, German, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
